snippet: The move comes as Marissa Mayer, Yahoo’s chief executive, tries to placate shareholders who are pressuring the company to cut costs.
abstract: Yahoo is closing its research and development center in China as its chief, Marissa Meyer, attempts to assuage shareholders who want costs cut.
lead_paragraph: The move comes as Marissa Mayer, Yahoo’s chief executive, tries to placate shareholders who are pressuring the company to cut costs.

headline.main: Yahoo Closing Research Center in China, Ending Effort There
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Closing Research Center in China, Ending Effort There
